comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

updating the configuration options gecko.handlerService.schemes.mailto.1.uriTemplate
and
gecko.handlerService.schemes.mailto.1.name
do not update dialog in firefox 4 preferences under applications.

A new name or url does not show if a new one like mailto.3 is modified as well.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. about:config
2. find 
3. update gecko.handlerService.schemes.mailto.1.name / uriTemplate
4. Go to preferences / applications find mailto , no changes shown
5. clicking on mailto: does not result in new url

This happens after firefox restart and computer reboot

Actual Results:  
no affect on settings


this is needed as the gmail.com mailto option produces a server error.

comments.raw_text: I suspect the pref in the Preferences dialog is coming from something other than gecko.handlerService.schemes.mailto.1.*
comments.text: I suspect the pref in the Preferences dialog is coming from something other than gecko.handlerService.schemes.mailto.1.*
comments.author: u279076@disabled.tld

comments.text:
Still reproducible on the latest versions of Firefox Nightly 96.0a1 (2021-11-23), beta 95.0b10 and release 94.0.2 on Windows 10.
Setting up a Severity of S4.
